Docs.param: The context within which the controller operates. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
The context within which the model is bound. The context includes information such as the model object, model name, model type, property filter, and value provider.
Docs.summary: Binds the model by using the specified controller context and binding context.
Docs.returns: The bound data object. If the model cannot be bound, this method returns null.Implements.
